goal: Control AI autonomy and creative freedom during development tasks
acceptance_criteria: Agent behavior matches selected focus level
Assumptions are made or avoided as specified
Extras and proactive additions follow level rules
Agent stops and asks when appropriate

features.name: Level 0: Full Autonomy
features.test_scenario: Given focus level 0, When implementing, Then agent makes reasonable assumptions, creates unlimited files, and adds proactive improvements
features.expected_result: Agent works with full creative freedom, adds helpers/abstractions/docs as beneficial

features.name: Level 1: Minimal + File-Constrained
features.test_scenario: Given focus level 1, When implementing, Then agent makes zero assumptions, creates only minimal requested files, and asks before adding anything
features.expected_result: Agent stops for all clarifications, creates single file when possible, no unrequested patterns

features.name: Level 2: Minimal + File-Unrestricted
features.test_scenario: Given focus level 2, When implementing, Then agent makes zero assumptions but can create multiple files as needed, no unrequested extras
features.expected_result: Agent asks for all ambiguities, creates necessary structure, avoids abstractions unless requested

features.name: Stop and Ask Conditions
features.test_scenario: Given focus level 1 or 2 and ambiguous request, When conditions trigger, Then agent stops and asks for clarification
features.expected_result: Agent asks when destination unclear, requirements vague, or would add unrequested patterns

features.name: Default Balanced Mode
features.test_scenario: Given no focus level specified, When implementing, Then agent uses balanced approach with reasonable assumptions
features.expected_result: Agent makes clear assumptions, standard patterns, asks when truly ambiguous
